post.desc:
I haven't thought about the specifics of the Hōrai immortality, actually. They're not actually immune to ailments. ~~They can and do get sick.~~ They just can't finally die from it. They regenerate.

So, you know. If somehow all else fails... a **hard reset** for the diaphragm may be the option left on the table – taking the rest of the body along with it too.
